детское_мероприятие: Is there a possibility of organizing a children's event in your institution?
навынос: Is it possible to order takeaway food and drinks?
отдельные_залы: Does your establishment have separate halls/rooms?
корпоратив: I would like to organize a corporate event for my employees at your place. Tell me the conditions.
детское_мероприятие_ответ: We can provide a platform for an unforgettable event for your children. Please contact our administrator at +375-44-5-201-201
навынос_ответ: Yes. Please contact our administrator at +375-44-5-201-201 for more details.
отдельные_залы_ответ: No. All the tables in our establishment are located in a common space.
корпоратив_ответ: You can arrange the closing service of our institution for the purpose of holding a private event. The cost of this service depends on the day of the week: from Sunday to Thursday inclusive from 15.000BYN; on Friday and Saturday from 45.000BYN. For more details, please contact +375-44-5-201-201.
